ghostPost.title: 2nd manual distribution of PART is complete.
ghostPost.plaintext:
Overfunders & Group 1 Claimants
Wednesday’s PART disbursement went out today. Thank you for completing the
wallet set up, enjoy staking those tokens!

Still waiting for your PART?
Please read Post launch update: July 24th, 2017
[https://particl.news/post-launch-update-july-24th-2017-419f55ddc89f] to see the
groups we’ve identified and the steps you need to take to secure your PART
token.

? Our next manual distribution will be Wednesday, August 9th. Don’t wait any
longer, set up your wallet
[https://particl.news/guide-how-to-generate-your-particl-exchange-passphrase-1fd78ba36fd1] 
and get your tokens!

PART tokens not showing up in your wallet?
The best assistance you can get is from the Particl Community members in our
#help slack channel. I would encourage you to signup [http://slack.particl.io/] 
and we will get you straightened away faster than you can track a bitcoin
across
the blockchain [http://blog.wizsec.jp/2017/07/breaking-open-mtgox-1.html].

prev.title: RELEASE: Particl Core 0.14.2.1

primary_tag.name: Progress
primary_tag.description: Get up to speed with all the most recent Particl developments!

tags.name: Progress
tags.description: Get up to speed with all the most recent Particl developments!

prev.plaintext:
Merged Bitcoin 0.14.2 + bug fixes
The Particl Development Team released the latest version of the Particl Core
wallet: Release 0.14.2.1
[https://github.com/particl/particl-core/releases/tag/v0.14.2.1]

The biggest news with this release is merging the latest Bitcoin code. A
description of updates for Bitcoin Core 0.14.2 can be found here
[https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/release-notes/release-notes-0.14.2.md]
.

• New features and fixes:
 * Merged Bitcoin 0.14.2
 * Subtract fee from amount works from QT for all transaction types
 * Coincontrol inputs and change address
 * Rare unicode characters in recovery passphrase fix
 * New Windows installer binaries for x32 and x64
 * walletpassphrase silent fail fixed
 * dumpwallet exports all keys in json format

Thank you,

Particl Team
prev.html:
Merged Bitcoin 0.14.2 + bug fixes

The Particl Development Team released the latest version of the Particl Core wallet: Release 0.14.2.1

The biggest news with this release is merging the latest Bitcoin code. A description of updates for Bitcoin Core 0.14.2 can be found here.

• New features and fixes:

  • Merged Bitcoin 0.14.2
  • Subtract fee from amount works from QT for all transaction types
  • Coincontrol inputs and change address
  • Rare unicode characters in recovery passphrase fix
  • New Windows installer binaries for x32 and x64
  • walletpassphrase silent fail fixed
  • dumpwallet exports all keys in json format

Thank you,

Particl Team

The Particl Team has released new features for community testing.
• Getting Started guide containing downloads:
Particl Testnet - Getting Started
[https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/Particl-Testnet-Getting-Started-d9yhExvCaW6vCp3qLUwuW]
Particl Testnet #5 - 31st July 2017 Start Time : 14:30 UTC Purpose The purpose
of this testnet is to get feedback on…

> Remember to start daemon with `-testnet`

 1. Merged Bitcoin 0.14.2
 2. Subtract fee from amount works from QT for all transaction types
 3. Coincontrol inputs and change address
 4. Rare unicode characters in recovery passphrase fix
 5. New Windows installer binaries for x32 and x64
 6. walletpassphrase silent fail fixed
 7. dumpwallet exports all keys in json format
